MAN.TITLE: manedit

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : character string (usually, name of a function)

DESCRIPTION.P: edit(manitem) opens the xml file associated to manitem in the scipad editor.
If there is no xml file associated with manitem and manitem is the name of a Scilab function scipad opens with the skeleton of the xml file produced by help_skeleton. This file is located in TMPDIR.

MAN.EXAMPLE:
manedit('manedit')
function [x,y,z]=foo123(a,b), x=a+b,y=a-b,z=a==b endfunction manedit foo123
